verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4046>plague<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H5375>Take<s%> the <S%H7218>sum<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>, throughout their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%>, all that are able to <S%H3318>go<s%> to <S%H6635>war<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with them in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Take the sum of the <S%H6242>people<s%>, from twenty <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

<S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, the <S%H1060>oldest<s%> son of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>; <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%>, of whom comes the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2599>Hanochites<s%>: of <S%H6396>Pallu<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6384>Palluites<s%>:
Of <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites<s%>: of <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3757>Carmites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>: and they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6396>Pallu<s%>; <S%H446>Eliab<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%>; <S%H5241>Nemuel<s%>, and <S%H1885>Dathan<s%>, and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>. This is that <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, which were <S%H7148>famous<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, who <S%H5327>argued<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, when they <S%H5327>argued<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

And the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and swallowed them <S%H1104>up<s%> together with <S%H7141>Korah<s%>, when that <S%H5712>company<s%> <S%H4194>died<s%>, what time the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>: and they became a <S%H5251>sign<s%>.
Nevertheless the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%> died <S%H4191>not<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H5241>Nemuel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5242>Nemuelites<s%>: of <S%H3226>Jamin<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3228>Jaminites<s%>: of <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3200>Jachinites<s%>:
Of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%>: of <S%H7586>Shaul<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7587>Shaulites<s%>.
These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H8099>Simeonites<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H6827>Zephon<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6831>Zephonites<s%>: of <S%H2291>Haggi<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2291>Haggites<s%>: of <S%H7764>Shuni<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7765>Shunites<s%>:
Of <S%H244>Ozni<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H244>Oznites<s%>: of <S%H6179>Eri<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6180>Erites<s%>:
Of <S%H720>Arod<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H722>Arodites<s%>: of <S%H692>Areli<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H692>Arelites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H705>them<s%>, forty <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%>: and <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H7956>were<s%>; of Shelah, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8024>Shelanites<s%>: of <S%H6557>Perez<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6558>Pharzites<s%>: of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2227>Zarhites<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> <S%H2696>were<s%>; of Hezron, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2697>Hezronites<s%>: of <S%H2538>Hamul<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2539>Hamulites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7657>them<s%>, sixty and sixteen <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H8439>Tola<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8440>Tolaites<s%>: of <S%H6312>Pua<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6324>Punites<s%>:
Of <S%H3437>Jashub<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3432>Jashubites<s%>: of <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8117>Shimronites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them<s%>, sixty and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H5624>Sered<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5625>Sardites<s%>: of <S%H356>Elon<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H440>Elonites<s%>: of <S%H3177>Jahleel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3178>Jahleelites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H2075>Zebulunites<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them<s%>, sixty <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4354>Machirites<s%>: and <S%H4353>Machir<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>: of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> come the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1569>Gileadites<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>: of <S%H372>Jeezer<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H373>Jeezerites<s%>: of <S%H2507>Helek<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2516>Helekites<s%>:
And of <S%H844>Asriel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H845>Asrielites<s%>: and of <S%H7928>Shechem<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7930>Shechemites<s%>:
And of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8062>Shemidaites<s%>: and of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2662>Hepherites<s%>.

And <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%> had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>, but <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> were <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>, and <S%H5270>Noah<s%>, <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%>, <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>them<s%>, fifty and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8364>Shuthalhites<s%>: of <S%H1071>Becher<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1076>Bachrites<s%>: of <S%H8465>Tahan<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8470>Tahanites<s%>.
And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7803>Shuthelah<s%>: of <S%H6197>Eran<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6198>Eranites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H7970>them<s%>, thirty and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>. These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H1106>Bela<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1108>Belaites<s%>: of <S%H788>Ashbel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H789>Ashbelites<s%>: of <S%H297>Ahiram<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H298>Ahiramites<s%>:
Of <S%H8197>Shupham<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7781>Shuphamites<s%>: of <S%H2349>Hupham<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2350>Huphamites<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1106>Bela<s%> were <S%H714>Ard<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>: of <S%H4940>Ard<s%>, the family of the <S%H716>Ardites<s%>: and of <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5280>Naamites<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H7748>Shuham<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites<s%>. These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

All the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7749>Shuhamites<s%>, according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H8346>them<s%>, were sixty and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H3232>Jimna<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3232>Jimnites<s%>: of <S%H3440>Jesui<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3441>Jesuites<s%>: of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1284>Beriites<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>: of <S%H2268>Heber<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2277>Heberites<s%>: of <S%H4439>Malchiel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4440>Malchielites<s%>.
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> was <S%H8294>Sarah<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> according to those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of <S%H2572>them<s%>; who were fifty and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H3183>Jahzeel<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3184>Jahzeelites<s%>: of <S%H1476>Guni<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1477>Gunites<s%>:
Of <S%H3337>Jezer<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3340>Jezerites<s%>: of <S%H8006>Shillem<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8016>Shillemites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%>.

These were the <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Unto these the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%>.

To <S%H7227>many<s%> you shall give the <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and to <S%H4592>few<s%> you shall give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: to every <S%H376>one<s%> shall his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to those that were numbered of <S%H6485>him<s%>.

Nevertheless the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%>: according to the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> they shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%>.
<S%H6310>According<s%> to the <S%H1486>lot<s%> shall the <S%H5159>possession<s%> there be <S%H2505>divided<s%> between <S%H7227>many<s%> and <S%H4592>few<s%>.

And these are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> after their <S%H4940>families<s%>: of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>: of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%>: of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4848>Merarites<s%>.

These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>: the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites<s%>, the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H7145>Korathites<s%>. And <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> <S%H3205>fathered<s%> <S%H6019>Amram<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H3115>Jochebed<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, whom her mother <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H3878>Levi<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H6019>Amram<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>.
And unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%>, and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, <S%H499>Eleazar<s%>, and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>.
And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>, all <S%H2145>males<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>: for they were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because there was no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> them <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

These are they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho<s%>.

But among these there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> of them whom <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%>, when they <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> of <S%H4191>them<s%>, They shall surely <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>. And there was not <S%H3498>left<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3612>them<s%>, save Caleb the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>.
